instructions: Cook pasta. In a pan, heat olive oil, add garlic, and sauté. Toss pasta with oil and garlic, add basil.
Mix flour, sugar, cocoa, and eggs. Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.
Toast bread, top with diced tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.
Marinate chicken with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Grill until cooked through.
Mix flour, eggs, and milk. Cook on a skillet until golden brown.
